content: the walcot beanie is a fabulously quick and textured chunky crochet hat pattern to suit everyone this season ingeniously made from the top down the seamless crochet hat uses two colours without endless ends the design comes in sizes baby through to adult to make one for the whole family a quick and simple crochet project perfect for gifts crafts fairs or for your own cold weather wardrobe of course *please note*-- this listing is for a pdf pattern not a finished product **what s included ** a five-page pdf written in us and uk terms colour work technique and resizing guide full pattern video tutorial pattern support of you need or would like it difficulty is intermediate **materials and tools ** hook 5 5mm/i or 6mm/j crochet hook yarn brava worsted by wecrochet 100% premium acrylic 218yds/100g please feel free to send me a message if you have any questions about the pattern as i am more than happy to help you out you are welcome to use this pattern for personal and commercial use to make and sell your finished items credit to hanjan crochet would be appreciated i d love you to join me at www hanjancrochet com and share my free patterns and tutorials with you - technical information file format this crochet pattern is provided as a digital pdf file only no physical copy of the pattern or finished item will be supplied by purchasing and downloading this pattern you agree to the following below file size under 20mb device/software compatibility compatible with devices supporting pdf readers such as adobe acrobat on smartphones tablets and computers internet requirements an internet connection is needed for downloading the file after purchase usage instructions download the pdf file from the confirmation email or your account s download section - usage instructions complete your purchase on this platform download the pdf file from the confirmation email or your account s download section open the file on any pdf-compatible device and follow the pattern instructions required tools see materials needed - safety and compliance compliance this pattern complies with the general product safety regulation gpsr and other applicable eu directives precautions not suitable for children under 16 without adult supervision ensure your device can open pdf files before purchase disclaimer this product is for educational and personal use only - refund policy this listing is for a digital download pdf pattern not the finished item due to the nature of digital downloads no refunds will be issued please review all product details before purchase disclaimer for use this pattern is provided as is without any guarantees or warranty in connection with the use of the pattern the designer makes no warranties of any kind either express or implied including but not limited to warranties of merchantability non-infringement or fitness for a particular purpose the designer is not liable for any damages including but not limited to direct indirect incidental or consequential damages arising from the use or inability to use
